word: YET PARENTING HAS LARGE SPIRITUAL IMPLICATIONS. “THERE ARE FEW PARENTS WHO REALIZE HOW IMPORTANT IT IS TO GIVE TO THEIR CHILDREN THE INFLUENCE OF A GODLY EXAMPLE. YET THIS IS FAR MORE POTENT THAN PRECEPT. NO OTHER MEANS IS SO EFFECTIVE IN TRAINING THEM TO RIGHT LINES.” AGAIN, ELLEN WHITE SAYS, “WHEN PARENTS AWAKEN TO A TRUE UNDERSTANDING OF THEIR NEGLECTED DUTIES, THEY WILL MARVEL AT THE SPIRITUAL BLINDNESS THAT HAS CHARACTERIZED THEIR PAST EXPERIENCE.”
